job

Class AbstractJob<T extends DatabaseItem,F extends AbstractFabric<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • job.AbstractJob<T,F>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The DatabaseItem managed.
    F - The related AbstractFabric.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJob<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryJob, CityJob, CustomerJob, DiscountJob, FlightJob, HotelJob, HotelRoomJob, ReservationJob

    public abstract class AbstractJob<T extends DatabaseItem,F extends AbstractFabric<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IJob<T>
    This class represents a generic Job it is parameterized by the DatabaseItem it will manage and the related AbstractFabric.
    Author:
    Gaston Lemaire
